BITD.contacts_adelaide_phroaig_long_desc: Perhaps a source for scores among the elite?
BITD.contacts_adikin_long_description: Perhaps a medium to the dark powers?
BITD.contacts_amancio_long_description: Perhaps a well-connected underworld figure, famous for their neutrality?
BITD.contacts_augus_long_description: Perhaps a good source for building schematics and historical details, or perhaps a rival who designs a security measures?
BITD.contacts_bazso_baz_long_description: Perhaps a paramour pursuing your affections, or perhaps a former lover, now scorned?
BITD.contacts_bennett_long_description: Perhaps he's seen them in the stars, or the sea?
BITD.contacts_bryl_long_description: Perhaps a reliable underworld contact, or perhaps an old partner with a grudge?
BITD.contacts_casta_long_description: Perhaps a mentor who trained you in the deadly arts, or vice versa?
BITD.contacts_celene_long_description: Celene is a guardian; a protector. Who does she watch over?
BITD.contacts_chael_long_description: Perhaps a member of a gang that you were in before the current crew, or an independent operator who's been in your way before?
BITD.contacts_conway_long_description: Perhaps an informant within the City Watch?
BITD.contacts_darmot_long_description: Perhaps a savvy officer that's busted you many times, or perhaps an old friend who turned to the law instead of crime?
BITD.contacts_decker_long_description: Perhaps a client in need of the illegal tools of the revolution?
BITD.contacts_dowler_long_description: Perhaps one of the rare deathlands scavengers that survived his sentence?
BITD.contacts_eckerd_long_description: Perhaps a good source of "raw materials"?
BITD.contacts_elynn_long_description: Perhaps a friend who can help with the infernal paperwork of the Empire?
BITD.contacts_esme_long_description: Perhaps a good source of news and gossip?
BITD.contacts_exeter_long_description: Perhaps a double-agent informant for you?
BITD.contacts_fitz_long_description: Perhaps an afficionado of strange artifacts?
BITD.contacts_flint_long_description: Perhaps a good source for unusual arcane supplies, or perhaps a rival in the occult world of Duskwall?
BITD.contacts_frake_long_description: Perhaps an expert that you go to for consultations, or perhaps a master who creates locks to defeat you?
BITD.contacts_gagan_long_description: Perhaps a scholar reluctantly answering the dark calling?
BITD.contacts_grace_long_description: Perhaps a former partner in thuggery, or a competitor on the scene?
BITD.contacts_harker_long_description: Perhaps a friend who you helped when you were in prison, or perhaps an enemy who hurt you when you served your time?
BITD.contacts_hoxley_long_description: Perhaps a friend of powerful ship captains?
BITD.contacts_irimina_long_description: Perhaps a potential patron for your crew?
BITD.contacts_jennah_long_description: Perhaps a good source for gossip among the upper class?
BITD.contacts_jeren_long_description: Perhaps a double-agent within the City Watch, or perhaps an overly curious officer, interested in your crimes?
BITD.contacts_jul_long_description: What other strange clients do they have?
BITD.contacts_karlos_long_description: Perhaps a source for off-book government "wet work"
BITD.contacts_klyra_long_description: Perhaps a good source for gossip?
BITD.contacts_laroze_long_description: Perhaps an informant within the City Watch?
BITD.contacts_lutes_long_description: Perhaps a good source of news and gossip?
BITD.contacts_lydra_long_description: Perhaps known for her vicious retribution on those who don't hold up to their end?
BITD.contacts_malista_long_description: To what forgotten god does Malista give her service?
BITD.contacts_marlane_long_description: Perhaps a pit fighter down at the docks, or a boxing coach who trained you?
BITD.contacts_marlo_long_description: Perhaps a good partner with a gang of tough thugs?
BITD.contacts_mateas_kline_long_descript: Perhaps he seeks to bring his family into the fold?
BITD.contacts_meg_long_description: Perhaps a trainer, or perhaps a fellow extortion artist?
BITD.contacts_melvir_long_description: Perhaps an old friend who's patched you up many times, or someone to whom you've sent too many victims?
BITD.contacts_mercy_long_description: Perhaps an assassin for hire, or a particularly deadly underworld scoundrel?
BITD.contacts_moriya_long_description: Perhaps she collects spirits for sacrifice?
BITD.contacts_nyelle_long_description: Perhaps a supplier for the strangest of cargo?
BITD.contacts_nyryx_long_description: Perhaps an informant to spark potential marks, or perhaps a rival manipulator?
BITD.contacts_petra_long_description: Perhaps a good source of information?
BITD.contacts_quellyn_long_description: Perhaps a knowledgeable healer and seer, or perhaps a student of yours who left over bad blood?
BITD.contacts_rigney_long_description: Perhaps a good source of news and gossip?
BITD.contacts_riven_long_description: Perhaps a good source of medicines for recovery?
BITD.contacts_rolan_long_description: Perhaps a client with strong underworld ties?
BITD.contacts_rolan_wott_long_descriptio: Perhaps with a feckless son in Doskvol academy, always in need of rescuing?
BITD.contacts_roslyn_kellis_long_descrip: Perhaps an old friend and confidant, or perhaps one of the victims of your espionage, bent on revenge?
BITD.contacts_salia_long_description: Perhaps a reliable contact for underworld jobs, or perhaps a former partner who sold you out?
BITD.contacts_sawtooth_long_description: Perhaps a buddy from the war, or perhaps a butcher who botched your treatment?
BITD.contacts_scurlock_long_description: Perhaps a mentor, or perhaps a deadly rival?
BITD.contacts_sera_long_description: Perhaps a supplier with military access?
BITD.contacts_setarra_description: Perhaps your partner in a dark endeavour, or perhaps an entity you once controlled, seeking vengeance?
BITD.contacts_sevoy_long_description: Perhaps a connection to clients with deep pockets?
BITD.contacts_stazia_long_description: Perhaps a former scoundrel turned to legitimate alchemical business, or perhaps the other way around?
BITD.contacts_steiner_long_description: Perhaps one of your competitors, or a former partner before you joined the crew?
BITD.contacts_telda_long_description: Perhaps a mentor who taught you your skills, or perhaps a rival sneak-thief?
BITD.contacts_tomas_long_description: Perhaps a former thug turned doctor?
BITD.contacts_trev_long_description: Perhaps a gang that helped your crew get started?
BITD.contacts_veldren_long_description: Perhaps an addict to poisoned to ever return to lucid thought, or perhaps an explorer of psychedelic realms beyond mere mortal experience?
BITD.contacts_veleris_long_description: Who does Veleris give his information to?
BITD.contacts_walker_long_description: Perhaps an employer who often needs violent work?
